QuestData.Title: A Meal for Birds
QuestData.Description:
I don't know why I agreed to this. We weren't supposed to be scavenging.
Kiro gave me specific instructions to head to the basin and feed the buzzards.
I can't go back to camp until they eat, but I'm not heading into that basin while the sethrak are still swarming.
Have you ever fed a buzzard? It's easy, I promise.
You kill it, they eat it. That simple.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill wildlife within The Brine Basin so Mekaru's buzzards can eat.
